title: Missing LP/ Promo
body: I played 3 games today, and started at 94 (or something similar) LP. I won my first game, and qualified for my promos. I was given the free win since I've already been at this promo. I lost my next game, and then won my final one. I noticed in my final one that I gained LP, and that I am on 99... What happened to my promo?

replies.body: Just remembered, my game crashed during a draft... This is ridiculous, I lose a promo because Riot's game crashes... GG

Game crashes during champ select will look like a dodge, which [counts as a loss](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) during your promos. Crashes in champ select are often caused by an unstable connection to the matchmaking servers, so this is likely a result of network settings that cause problems with League. I'd like you to run through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if your issue persists through those steps.
